vecUnachieved.strDescription: Win a game via the mercy rule.

data.strFullDescription:
[p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/a6e28da68204a7c26c906a61fc422fdb.poster.avif?t=1746230977" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/a6e28da68204a7c26c906a61fc422fdb.webm?t=1746230977"][/imgvid][/p][h2]⚽️ [b]FREE TO PLAY [/b]⚽️ [b]MULTIPLAYER FOOTBALL [/b]⚽️ [b]LEGENDARY HEROES[/b] ⚽️   [/h2][p]Football Heroes League is a high-octane multiplayer soccer game where superhuman abilities meet precise controls. A real person controls every player on the pitch, creating dynamic matches blending tactics with spectacular special moves. Master the intuitive third-person control system to aim shots, thread perfect passes, and unleash mind-blowing character abilities that defy physics. Team up with friends, show off your skills, and climb the ranks to become a legendary Soccer God!


[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/539ffd33494ef8fefde67ec33ab620fa.webp?t=1746230977[/img]Experience soccer reimagined with astounding heroic abilities blended with strategic gameplay for high-stakes competitive matches.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/16990d13d0c85c15537815a177c9a20a.avif?t=1746230977[/img]

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/d1941582927d2c9de80f6b05b70c0be4.webp?t=1746230977[/img][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/af61e0bdab15214ae5a707327c833f37.webp?t=1746230977[/img]  Master the innovative aiming system to unleash perfect shots and passes[/p][p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/af61e0bdab15214ae5a707327c833f37.webp?t=1746230977[/img]  Charge your kicks for devastating power plays[/p][p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/af61e0bdab15214ae5a707327c833f37.webp?t=1746230977[/img]  Execute advanced moves like juggling, trapping, and precision dribbling[/p][p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/af61e0bdab15214ae5a707327c833f37.webp?t=1746230977[/img]  Dominate with strategic steals and slide tackles


[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/97a4db42e96e1788a218a88fef4ef81c.webp?t=1746230977[/img]Choose from a diverse roster of extraordinary characters, with more to come throughout Early Access:

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/d67989f348cb1ec25594cd0a3cd9fa7d.avif?t=1746230977[/img][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/23e326c986219c3cb0686e3d1403e12a.avif?t=1746230977[/img][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/c674b5dce75408960d0c1070d252c934.avif?t=1746230977[/img][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/dba2d39ae8b0dc0649fe248819afe1a2.avif?t=1746230977[/img][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/e1ed2a11f60fe7a6ce433e63d6dd5c43.avif?t=1746230977[/img]

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/64d5804b5b9fdaeec5bc585e26c87598.webp?t=1746230977[/img][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/af61e0bdab15214ae5a707327c833f37.webp?t=1746230977[/img]  Team up with friends in dynamic online matches[/p][p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/af61e0bdab15214ae5a707327c833f37.webp?t=1746230977[/img]  Unlock new characters and customize your look[/p][p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/af61e0bdab15214ae5a707327c833f37.webp?t=1746230977[/img]  Climb from rookie divisions to legendary Soccer God status[/p][p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/af61e0bdab15214ae5a707327c833f37.webp?t=1746230977[/img]  Enjoy skill-based matchmaking for perfectly balanced games[/p][p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/af61e0bdab15214ae5a707327c833f37.webp?t=1746230977[/img]  Complete daily and weekly quests to earn rewards

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/68cc175b5e26d99b4ae82ff497497841.avif?t=1746230977[/img]

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/365d316581ace7c4c5ccff083fdd8296.webp?t=1746230977[/img][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/af61e0bdab15214ae5a707327c833f37.webp?t=1746230977[/img]  Jump into 2v2, 3v3, or 5v5 matches[/p][p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/af61e0bdab15214ae5a707327c833f37.webp?t=1746230977[/img]  Train against AI opponents[/p][p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/af61e0bdab15214ae5a707327c833f37.webp?t=1746230977[/img]  Master abilities in a dedicated Training Mode[/p][p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/af61e0bdab15214ae5a707327c833f37.webp?t=1746230977[/img]  Coming Soon: Instant Replay System to capture your greatest moments


[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/8991b77e7f4776cdfd696c08312732b0.poster.avif?t=1746230977" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/8991b77e7f4776cdfd696c08312732b0.webm?t=1746230977"][/imgvid][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/0adbf5e748fbb454ce70586b91d168a9.webp?t=1746230977[/img]Join us in shaping the future of Football Heroes League! As an indie studio passionate about creating something extraordinary, we're excited to build this game alongside our community. Your feedback and support will help us deliver the competitive soccer experience of your dreams.[/p][p]See you on the pitch!

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2593870/extras/af61e0bdab15214ae5a707327c833f37.webp?t=1746230977[/img]  Run Games[/p]
data.strSnippet: Football Heroes League is a high-octane multiplayer soccer game where superhuman abilities meet precise controls.
